document.packagename: Pagkilala sa Diyos ng Personal (Heartbeat Edition)

page.tnt-trx-ref-value: 1 God Loves You And Created You To Know Him Personally.

document.page: 1 Ini-ibig ka ng Diyos at Nilikha ka Niya upang makilala Siya ng Personal.

page.tnt-trx-ref-value: 2 We Are Separated From God By Our Sin, So We Cannot Know Him Or Experience His Love.

document.page: 2 Tayo ay nahiwalay sa Diyos dahil sa kasalanan, kaya't hindi natin Siya lubos na makilala o maranasan ang pag-ibig niya.

page.tnt-trx-ref-value: 3 Jesus Is God's Only Solution For Our Sin. Only Through Him Can We Know God And Receive His Love And Forgiveness.

document.page: 3 Si Hesu-Kristo ang tanging lunas sa ating kasalanan. Sa pamamagitan niya ay malalaman natin ang pag-ibig at plano ng Diyos sa ating buhay.

page.tnt-trx-ref-value: 4 We Must Each Respond To Jesus By Placing Our Trust In Him As Our Saviour And Lord. Only Then Can We Know God Personally.

document.page: 4 Kinakailangan nating tanggapin si Hesu-Kristo na ating Tagapagligtas at Panginoon; saka lamang natin Siya makikilala ng personal.
